Class Masker

All Implemented Interfaces:
Maskable
Deprecated. Use StyleMasker and VisibleMasker instead 

@Deprecated
public abstract class Masker
extends Object
implements Maskable

Allow to externally mask an element.
A masker will generally mask the entire application and block any user action
